entry.name: event.currentTarget
entry.title: event.currentTarget
entry.desc: The current DOM element within the event bubbling phase.

longdesc.p: This property will typically be equal to the this of the function.

p.em: If you are using jQuery.proxy or another form of scope manipulation, this will be equal to whatever context you have provided, not event.currentTarget

example.desc: Alert that currentTarget matches the `this` keyword.
